website_summaries.verdict: The pan combines great quality and value with nice details for durability.
pros: Heavy-grade aluminized steel evenly distributes heat
Two-layer coating reduces risk of scratches
Nice square-rolled edges provide a secure grip
cons: The textured baking surface can be difficult to clean

customer_reviews.title: Not actually dishwasher safe despite description.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically because the description on Amazon said it was dishwasher safe, but the actual product is labeled hand wash only.
customer_reviews.author: A Tye

customer_reviews.title: Warped a few minutes in to first use. :(
customer_reviews.text: Wow. These are beautiful pans and I was excited to swap them out for my old tarnished avolon pans. Within a few minutes at 400F there was a "pop" and one of the pans was warped. So disappointing after all the hype.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hill

customer_reviews.title: Best cookie sheet I have used.
customer_reviews.text: The OXO jelly roll pan is superior to any cookie sheet I have used. The textured surface provides air movement and cookies, for example, bake with an even, golden bottom. Also the pan remains flat in the oven. I actually baked cookies for three days in a row after receiving the pan. However, like all cookie sheets it does have a rust issue under the raised edge, but that's a minor issue. Some day manufacturers will find a way to encapsulate or put a non-rust finish on the steel(?) support structure on bakeware.
customer_reviews.author: Dot in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: It at most will make a 13.5 inch cake. Misleading (wrong) measurements.
customer_reviews.text: My recipe calls for a 10 x 14 inch jelly roll pan so I can make tiramisu that fits in the tiramisu pan. :) . So a larger 15 x 10 should work right? Nope, the bottom of the inside of the pan measures about 13.5. If you measure the longest OUTTER RIM its 14 & 3/4". That is NOT 15" and nobody cares about an outside rim for holding a pan. Just tell us how big that jelly roll will really be. :( I think I'll have to return this very nice pan... :(
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Would buy another one and follow my baking methods.
customer_reviews.text: Love the pan. 1st baking today I loosened around the edge , turned onto towel and gave whack to center with my fist. Came right out in one piece. I used paper towel to put lite oil on pan. Second jelly roll I put parchment in and then batter. Paper was not quite long enough. Baked, loosen around edges, turned out on towel and gave whack in middle. Cake with parchment came out, edge with no parchment nor oil broke off. It stuck. My experience says oil entire pan with oil or use parchment to all edges. This pan is not going to bake well with nothing on it. It is heavy and did not bow.
customer_reviews.author: JERRY H.

customer_reviews.title: Not 10x15 inside 8.5x13.37
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is a good pan. However, I ordered thinking it was 10x15 and it IS NOT! Disappointmented because I was looking forward to making a Texas sheet cake all day and was waiting for it to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon D. Josendale

customer_reviews.title: High quality, easy to clean, and holds up over time
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this pan for a few months now, and it's still in very good condition. I read that some other people had issues with the pan warping, but mine is even and in just as good of a condition as it was when it arrived. I never bake directly on the pan; I always use parchment paper. But it distributes heat evenly, as far as I can tell (my oven does not heat evenly to begin with, but this pan matched the heat pattern of my other pans, which were all even in my old faithful oven (RIP).
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions on listing are external listing. 10x15 is 10x15 ...
customer_reviews.text: Dimensions on listing are external listing. 10x15 is 10x15 outside and 8.5x13 on the inside. Photo attached. Use and care instruction says to handwash and not to use under broiler. Photo also attached.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Jelly Roll Pan Warps in Oven
customer_reviews.text: I do put this pan in the dishwasher, but still have to scrub it by hand after running through load. Mainly, I use this pan to bake fish fillets, and have to use 3M green nylon pads to scrub off the baked on bits of crusts. My biggest gripe is the warping of the pan while baking in oven.
customer_reviews.author: luvshihtzu

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I was frustrated when sheet pans bend using the broiler. This one claimed heavy duty but bent in the oven the first time I used it. Very disappointed especially since OXO usually makes good products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Despite the product clearly stating that the pan is 10 x 15 inch, it is less obviously referring to the external dimensions. It should go without saying that it is the internal dimensions, the area in which food will be prepared, that is the bigger concern for someone wishing to, in my case, use this pan to bake a cake. The pan looks like it is good quality material and build, but I can't say how it handles because I couldn't use it for the cake I was making; it is simply too small to hold the batter.
customer_reviews.author: Danny J

customer_reviews.title: versatile pam
customer_reviews.text: deep enough sides to roast veggies without them sliding off the pan. can also add up to 1 1/2 c liquid without it spilling over if you plan to steam/sauce items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good pan. Very sturdy. Walls are nice height. Good nonstick finish. Warps a bit at 450 degrees, but returns to flatness when cool.
customer_reviews.author: DLS-47

customer_reviews.title: Just classic great quality from OXO
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Literally nothing will stick to this badboy that won’t easily come off. I’ve never had a pan that would genuinely do that. Just classic great quality from OXO
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cooking for two
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow, I can’t believe I didn’t buy this sooner! I’ve always used half sheets for baking, but this was a game changer. As I typically cook dinner for two, it’s the perfect size for a couple chicken breasts, or a perfect portion of vegetables, or a small batch of rolls. Easy to clean and holds up well so far!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia J

customer_reviews.title: Very small!
customer_reviews.text: As others stated, this is quite a bit smaller than the size as given. I ordered the jelly roll pan size and it is about 2" smaller in width and length. Finish is really nice. I would have preferred rolled rounded edges but they are rolled-squared.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cakes came out in one piece every time..
customer_reviews.text: I made my first rolled cake and I put in the parchment paper and it browned beautifully and came out very easily, cleaned up easily, very durable.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth hedden

customer_reviews.title: OXO fan for life
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a huge fan of OXO products. They’re always functional and well made. This pan is no exception. It’s sturdy and worked great for the jelly roll I made.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa VanKirk

customer_reviews.title: The best I have found
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in April and would not use any other brand. If you want quality measuring cups and spoons, spend the money on these. They give US measures as well as metric. I expect them to last for years. They are very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Inquiring  customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making Momofuku Milk Bar layer cakes. This is the size pan you need if you’re looking for their quarter sheet pan. It doesn’t warp or “pop” in the oven like my Wilton sheet pans do.
customer_reviews.author: today4ulove

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Works as described easy to clean and foods don’t stick. Use plastic utensils because metal will scratch the surface
customer_reviews.author: D W

customer_reviews.title: great pan
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done with ease and cleans up very well
customer_reviews.author: lanops72

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy pans
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these to make a cake roll for a birthday event, and they were just perfect. I was pleased with how sturdy they were. They heat really evenly and have held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: NDinOKC

customer_reviews.title: Will buy another.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pan. I am going to look at buying the larger one. I want to use them for one-pan oven meals. The side height is 1" which should be high enough so nothing spills in the oven. I bought 2 other pans about 8 months ago with 1/2" side and the coating is coming off and won't work for this type of recipe.
customer_reviews.author: CCRose

customer_reviews.title: OXO scores again with a winning product
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to love about OXO. This Jelly Roll pan is not only lovely to look at, it feels top quality and bakes like a dream. No sticking, easy cleanup, no warping. Quite happy with this baking pan.
customer_reviews.author: North Carolina shopping chickTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: You will gain friends, and weight, if you buy this!
customer_reviews.text: My friend loves it! I enjoy her desserts very much!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, buy it!! The best cookie sheets I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend
customer_reviews.text: Only when stuff is burnt to it does is it hard to clean. One of them warped in the oven when I was baking salmon at 500 degrees but it popped back into its normal shape once it cooled off. They are not flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S.

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect measurements. It is smaller and only 1⁄4 in ...
customer_reviews.text: Incorrect measurements. It is smaller and only 1⁄4 in deep. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: LIZ FOSTER

customer_reviews.title: Dents way too easily
customer_reviews.text: Just received the item and it was already dented. This is unacceptable and makes me question the longevity of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: great looking and practical
customer_reviews.text: These are small baking pans for smaller ovens. the product itself is terrific. easy to clean and a non-stick surface. and they look beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: pb123

customer_reviews.title: Oxo jelly roll pan
customer_reviews.text: I use this too heat food in the oven, usually with parchment paper. I really like it. I have had no issues with it buckling and I have used it at high temperatures. I have not baked on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS.
customer_reviews.text: This is the kind of pan Christina Tosi uses, so... That right there should be enough. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: J Blotter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pan! I’ve used it many times and I’m completely happy with it
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: Great pan for pumpkin rolls
customer_reviews.text: Looked everywhere for a jelly roll pan and couldn’t find one..Finally looked online and bingo..
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Dean

customer_reviews.title: mostly use for roasting veggies, works just fine for that
customer_reviews.text: mostly use for roasting veggies, works just fine for that haven't had it long enough to rate durability
customer_reviews.author: P. Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Great pan! I love it
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my victoria sponge cake that I then used to make a Tiramisu cake. This is now my special cake making pan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pans ever. I love OXO products
customer_reviews.author: kiki

customer_reviews.title: Really nice pans
customer_reviews.text: REALLY nice pans and nothing sticks to them. Heavy, great feel.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan!!! Made a pumpkin roll and it turned out perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlie J

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This pan is sturdy and heavy. I had to return it as it was to small for me.
customer_reviews.author: CHRATCAL

customer_reviews.title: A must have for bakers !
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pan for making a jelly roll cake. It is very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda A Keiffer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pumpkin Roll
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these to make pumpkin roll. They work perfectly and the cake part of the pumpkin roll comes right out of the pan. I do line the pan with parchment paper...
customer_reviews.author: Becky B.

customer_reviews.title: The grid pattern is a winner
customer_reviews.text: This has a fine grid pattern that my wife says she loves after a period of scepticism.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid pan and is as good as the higher priced pans from Sur la Table.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Johnsen

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased and great sturdy quality
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased and great sturdy quality. Cookies cooked evenly. I owned a Calphalon cookie sheet and it was double the price and half the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan
customer_reviews.text: High quality pan that works well.....This pan is top notch in construction. It heats evenly, does not stick, and cleans well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this pan to do some chocolate chip cookie bars and they turned out great. Even bake, no sticking and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Luethe

customer_reviews.title: No warping
customer_reviews.text: I baked a slab apple pie on this pan. Baked evenly, no warping , and easy removal and cleanup .
customer_reviews.author: Slim sissy

customer_reviews.title: Not 10x15!
customer_reviews.text: NOT a 10x15 pan! Sloped sides leave you with an internal dimension (per measurement on packaging) of only 8.49x13.37 inches.
customer_reviews.author: KAS

customer_reviews.title: Love this jelly roll pan!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! I can use it for baking or for french fries or asparagus and it doesn't lose it's shape and cleans up nicely!
customer_reviews.author: CindyC

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning this pan. It was advertised at 10 x 15 when it's actually 9.97x 14.8. Yes, it does make a difference in baking.
customer_reviews.author: judy epstein

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it stiffness it’s 39 is it cleans well and it’s a very nice looking pan for a jelly roll
customer_reviews.author: NIcole I.

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are wrong on jelly roll pan
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 10 x 15 inch jelly roll pan. It is no where near the measurements I need.
customer_reviews.author: Ida Leal

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: First time using a jelly pan and is so easy to use and very easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A Minamoto

customer_reviews.title: Area NOT 10x15
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that the area of the pan is not even close to a 10x15. Doesn’t work for the recipe I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: LMF

customer_reviews.title: Jelly Roll Pan Size Issue
customer_reviews.text: I'd bought this 10"x15" jelly roll pan to use expressly and exclusively with a 9.5"x14.375" Mrs. Anderson's silicone baking mat, but the mat won't fit in this pan which is supposed to be larger than the mat, so It is a huge disappointment for that reason, and because people seem to have a problem with these pans warping even at moderate temperatures. I don't understand why these makers and sellers cannot provide not only accurate measurements, but actually measure the interior aspect of the pan most critical to its use.
customer_reviews.author: An Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: VERY inaccurate measurements/description. The inside measurements of a Jelly ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY inaccurate measurements/description. The inside measurements of a Jelly Roll Pan should measure 10x15. This particular one measures 8.5x13.5. Therefor it cannot be used for recipes calling for a 10x15 Jelly Roll Pan. It is considerably smaller and should not be listed as a 10x15 Jelly Roll Pan.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Always dependable.
customer_reviews.text: OXO has always been known for outstanding kitchen tools. I still have my OXO paring knife from 8 years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Paul H. Onishi

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan but....
customer_reviews.text: I'm now looking to buy another 10x15 pan because that is what I purchased but not what I received. The pan I received is well made, sturdy...looks like it might last a lifetime but the rim is much larger than the base which...at the bottom of the sheet is most definitely not 10x 15... i bought a Wilton silicone mat which does not fit then a smaller more expensive silpat mat which is still too large...$25 spent for nothing...I would give it 5 stars if it was truly what they stamp on the pan and advertise. Very disappointed in OXO
customer_reviews.author: DianaruTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this pan! Perfect for my Texas Sheet Cake!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This pan was not the size it was supposed to be. I wanted a true jelly roll pan to make- you guessed it, traditional roll cakes. I can’t remember the exact measurements but it wasn’t even close to a standard jelly roll size. The pan was also much deeper than you would want to make a roll cake in. Quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: wendee

customer_reviews.title: Great pan !!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jelly roll pan. This pan help my pumpkin bread to cook even
customer_reviews.author: sweet candy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pan! I loved it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pan! I loved it. I got it along with a wire rack but the rack is a bit too small and it flops down. However, the pan itself is really nice quality for baking healthy sweet potato wedges.
customer_reviews.author: JUDITH H. PAWLOSKI

customer_reviews.title: It bends! It's too thin
customer_reviews.text: It bends on the oven, I use to have a similar pan for years, when I decide to replace it I found this that was the same size and look similar, but it is not. This one look to be a good quality pan but when used in the oven is bend diagonally from one corner to the other, when the temperature is too high. I'll not recommend it, I didn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Much thicker than I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.text: This is much thicker than I hoped or expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Judy10021

customer_reviews.title: Terrific baking sheet
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews that talked about these sheets warping, and the ones I ordered (10" x 15") did not! I bought these to replace very old, black ones that frustrated me when I cooked frozen wings at 450 deg., and they stuck so bad I left the best skin on the pans. Not only did these pans not warp, the wings did not stick. I'd recommend these to anyone. I will be buying the larger ones too, and maybe they'll warp because of the width-to-length ratio, but oh well! Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Mbl1959

customer_reviews.title: Worth it's weight in cheaper pans!
customer_reviews.text: There are cheaper Jelly Roll pans out there, but this heavyweight is worth every penny. Stamped from a thick, single sheet of metal with a unique textured bottom that helps keep baked goods from sticking. The rim is thick, with rolled edges. You don't feel any flex when picking this up by the corner. I have made very thick, fudgey, brownies in this and have had zero issue with them sticking to the bottom. Outside of commercial grade half-baking sheets, this pan is absolutely a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Denlinger

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: This pan is listed as being a 10" x 15" x 1" Jelly Roll Pan. I was very disappointed when it arrived as the exterior measurements weren't even up to this size which made the inside very much smaller. It is a shame because it is heavily made and seems like it would be quite durable. However, a jelly roll recipe that calls for this size pan would likely run over. I'm back to searching for a true inside measurement Jelly Roll Pan.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce from Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Wraps at 425 degrees
customer_reviews.text: The pan is easy to clean, dishwasher safe. My complaint is it warps at 425 degrees, won’t recommend it for roasting.
customer_reviews.author: Shiya

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy pan, and also very easy to clean. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: That's Me!

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE JELLY ROLL SIZE , MEASUREMENTS WRONG ITS 9 x13 pan NOT 10x15
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE JELLY ROLL SIZE , MEASUREMENTS WRONG ITS 9 x13 pan NOT 10x15. Item arrived and has “jelly roll” cover on pan but size specs are not 10 x15. This pan is way too small for what i need. Returned the pan and now trying to find the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cake Pan.
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan. Super sturdy and the cake did not stick. I made a Texas Sheet Cake and it turned out perfect. Not sure how a cake pan can be versatile and I wouldn't risk ruining it by broiling vegetables in it but I'm sure you could use it for that. I'll stick to super yummy chocolate cakes instead and use the cheaply made pans for other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this pan. I bought it to make a slab apple pie (an amazing decision as it was a crowd pleaser). The pan was easy to clean before and after use. The textured bottom made it easy remove food from the pan. I also used it to make cinnamon rolls and it worked like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Brand

customer_reviews.title: Size is not 15" x 10"
customer_reviews.text: Beware that although this states 15"x10". When you look further at the description it states (Internal dimensions are 8.49 in x 13.37 in). I did not buy the correct size that I needed because I didn't read ....read more...
customer_reviews.author: Danni Hessler

customer_reviews.title: WARPS
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this pen, every time I use it and put it in the oven at 375, 400 it warps terribly! Otherwise it’s a good pan, but it shouldn’t warp!
customer_reviews.author: Jishie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our larger size Breville toaster convection oven. The pan that came with it quickly degraded. It is really hard to find something that will fit it. This does perfectly. We've been using it for maybe a year and it's still like new. Nice heavy weight and cleans up great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Farkash

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my pumpkin rolls
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time tonight to make a pumpkin roll and it worked perfectly! I lined the pan with parchment paper, all but the long sides. The cake separated nicely with no damage. I'll be buying another so I can do 2 at a time.
customer_reviews.author: S Dot

customer_reviews.title: I needed a new jelly roll pan as my best recipe for Scottish Shortbread cookies calls for this size ...
customer_reviews.text: After many years of wear and tear, I needed a new jelly roll pan as my best recipe for Scottish Shortbread cookies calls for this size pan. This pan is not your everyday replacement pan, it's the greatest pan I have now. I will be replacing my other cookie sheets with Oxo nonstick pans!
customer_reviews.author: Donna D

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of this pan
customer_reviews.text: Tried a jelly roll and it (jelly roll pan). It stuck so bad. Not a fan of this pan. Will need to use parchment paper on it next time.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I found my late mother's recipe box. A number of them called for a "jelly roll" pan. This pan is perfect. Excellent quality like most oxo products.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know what I was missing
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn't expect to love this as much as I do. It is a great weight and not thin or tinny at all. I bake all the time but have never owned a jelly roll -- I didn't know just how much I would use this thing until I bought one. Love the color, too.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love using these. They are prefect. Had no problem with warping even at 475. Highly recommended!

customer_reviews.text: The coating started peeling off after two use. I wrote an email to OXO. We'll see how they respond.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. Made in USA and it shows
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Made in USA and it shows. Excellent addition to any kitchen and any baker who makes jelly rolls. It looks like it is going to handle a lot over a long time. Sturdy and great product.

customer_reviews.title: This pan is great. The metal is thick and I believe it ...
customer_reviews.text: This pan is great. The metal is thick and I believe it to be quality. It is much better than some of the options at big box stores. The raised shapes inside also creat nice nooks for jelly or frosting!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Westwood

customer_reviews.title: A great pan
customer_reviews.text: Great pan. I love it. Cleans up great. It is good heavy quality without being too heavy. I will be adding difference sizes to my collection..

customer_reviews.title: Great jelly roll pan
customer_reviews.text: This product is such good quality. It really matters when you are baking any kind of roll. This is a baking pan you will have forever.

customer_reviews.title: Great pan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: not as big as they said they are, but works great

product_meta.title: OXO Good Grips Non-Stick Pro Jelly Roll 10 x 15 Inch
product_meta.description: Style Name:Jelly Roll 10" x 15"OXO Bakeware combines strong, durable, and precise engineering with the thoughtful touches that are characteristic of all OXO products. This line of Non-Stick Pro Bakeware is made of heavy-grade aluminized steel that ensures durability and promotes even heat distribution for a more reliable bake and is coated with a commercial grade, double-layer, ceramic-reinforced PTFE non-stick coating. This provides powerful non-stick capability, as well as scratch-,stain-,corrosion-, and abrasion resistance. The non-stick line also features a micro-textured pattern that ensures even baking by minimizing your food's surface contact with the pan and promoting airflow. All OXO Good Grips Non-Stick Pro Bakeware pieces feature generous square-rolled edges for reinforcement and a secure grip, and are dishwasher safe for easy cleanup.
feature_bullets: Ideal for jelly rolls, bars and cookies
Heavy-gauge aluminized steel promotes even heat distribution
Swiss-engineered, ceramic-reinforced, two-layer coating allows for easy food release while protecting against scratching, staining and corrosion
Micro-textured, non-stick pattern minimizes surface contact and increases airflow for an even bake
Square-rolled edges add strength and offer a secure grip for easy transfer to and from oven
Internal dimensions are 8.49 in x 13.37 in
Made in the USA from globally sourced materials
